text.div:
Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
v2-concCommenthttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-concCommentstringV2 Concept Comment
v2-concCommentAsPubhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-concCommentAsPubstringV2 Concept Comment As Published

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0616 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
M MovedMovedThe individual associated with the address has moved and is no longer reachable at the addressThe individual associated with the address has moved and is no longer reachable at the address
E Added in errorAdded in errorThe address was incorrect and should never have been associated with the individualThe address was incorrect and should never have been associated with the individual
R On requestOn requestThe associated individual requested that the address be removed from their recordThe associated individual requested that the address be removed from their record
C CorrectedCorrectedThe address has been replaced with a corrected versionThe address has been replaced with a corrected version

name: AddressExpirationReason
title: addressExpirationReason
description: Code system of concepts specifying the reason this address was marked as "ended".  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the XAD segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0616 (Address Expiration Reason)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
